mapper.select: select h.hr_num as hr_num, e.e_id as e_id, e.e_name as e_name, e.e_num as e_num, d.d_name as d_name, e.e_position as e_position, h.hr_date as hr_date, h.hr_leave as hr_leave, h.hr_status as hr_status, h.hr_note as hr_note from employee e right join department d on e.d_num = d.d_num left outer join hr h on e.e_id = h.e_id where e.e_id = #{e_id} AND (to_char(h.hr_date,'yyyymmdd') =to_char(sysdate, 'yyyymmdd')OR h.hr_date is null) order by hr_date desc

select h.hr_num as hr_num, e.e_name as e_name, e.e_num as e_num, d.d_name as d_name, e.e_position as e_position, h.hr_date as hr_date, h.hr_leave as hr_leave, h.hr_status as hr_status, h.hr_note as hr_note from employee e left join hr h on e.e_id = h.e_id join department d on e.d_num = d.d_num where d.d_num = (select d_num from employee where e_id = #{e_id}) AND ( to_char(h.hr_date,'yyyymmdd') =to_char(sysdate, 'yyyymmdd') OR h.hr_date is null) order by hr_date desc
mapper.insert: insert into hr (hr_num, hr_date, hr_status, hr_note, e_id) select seq_hr.nextval, sysdate, (case when (to_char(sysdate, 'HH24:MI:SS') > cast('09:00:00' as char)) then '지각' else '출근' end) , '--', #{e_id} from dual where not exists (select * from hr where e_id=#{e_id} AND to_char(hr_date, 'yyyymmdd')=to_char(sysdate, 'yyyymmdd'))
mapper.update: update hr set hr_note='외근' where e_id = #{e_id} and to_char(hr_date, 'yyyymmdd')=to_char(sysdate, 'yyyymmdd')
update hr set hr_leave = sysdate, hr_status='퇴근' where e_id = #{e_id} and to_char(hr_date, 'yyyymmdd')=to_char(sysdate, 'yyyymmdd')
